Class AdventureGame

extends Object

    Bart Sébastien and Krol Mikolaï Class to manage a dungeon game

        public void playerMoveTo(Direction direction)
                  throws NoRoomInThisDirectionException
        Parameters:

        Throws:
        NoRoomInThisDirectionException - if the player move to a non existing position

      • isFinished

        public boolean isFinished()
        Returns:
        true if the game is finished (player dead or in an exit room), false otherwise

      • getPossibleActions

        public List<Action> getPossibleActions(List<Action> AllActions,
                                       Room r)
        Parameters:
        AllActions - The list of all the actions
        r - the current room
        Returns:
        A list of all the actions that are possible

      • play

        public void play(Player player)
          throws NoRoomInThisDirectionException,
                 BadParametersForThisItemException
        Parameters:
        player - the main character that the user will control
        Throws:
        NoRoomInThisDirectionException - if during the game the player move to a non existing direction (can't happen)
        BadParametersForThisItemException - if bad item
